title: Shower Time
description: "I surprised you as you took your usual shower. I seized your arms and bound you to the bar, and then left you alone immediately after. You are left for a few minutes to wonder what is going on. Stirred and hot from the shower, but wetter still at your vulnerability and the anticipation of what is to come..."An erotic first-person short story from bdsm author James Wood.
author: James   Wood
